headline.print_headline: Sales of Art Online Topped $2 Billion in 2014
headline.main: Online Art Buying Rises in New Market Report

snippet: Sales of art online rose to $2.64 billion in 2014, compared to $1.57 billion the previous year, according to a report to be issued on Tuesday.
abstract: Sales of art online rose to $2.64 billion in 2014, compared to $1.57 billion the previous year, according to a report to be issued on Tuesday.
